item.title: Dave James
item.description: Dave has been gaming since the days of Zork and Lode Runner. He built his first gaming PC at the tender age of 16, and hasn’t stopped tearing them apart since. When he’s not testing the latest GPUs or mechanical keyboards, you can find him complaining about the lack of good RTS games.

item.title: Fraser Brown
item.description: Fraser lives for map painting simulators and 4X strategy games. If it involves managing an economy or conquering Europe, he’s playing it. He’s also the resident expert on everything Warhammer related.

item.title: Lauren Morton
item.description: Lauren loves RPGs, survival games, and farming sims. She’s usually busy building a base in Valheim or romancing characters in Baldur’s Gate 3.

item.title: Robin Valentine
item.description: Robin has spent far too much money on plastic miniatures. He covers the intersection of tabletop and digital gaming, RPGs, and anything with a good narrative hook.

item.title: Tyler Wilde
item.description: Tyler has been covering competitive gaming for over a decade. From CS:GO majors to The International, he’s seen it all. He also has a soft spot for weird indie games.

item.title: Wes Fenlon
item.description: Wes is obsessed with emulation, CRTs, and preserving gaming history. He’s the guy to ask if you want to know the best way to play PS2 games on a modern PC.

item.title: All Roblox Rivals codes and how to redeem them
item.description:
Roblox Rivals codes are essential for players who want to stand out in this intense shooter. These codes can grant you exclusive weapon wraps, keys, and other cosmetic items to show off your style on the battlefield.

Active Roblox Rivals Codes (December 2025)

  • COMMUNITY: Redeem for a Community Wrap
  • RIVALS2025: Redeem for a Key
  • SHOOTOUT: Redeem for a limited-time charm

How to Redeem Codes in Roblox Rivals

  1. Open Roblox Rivals.
  2. Click on the Rewards button (gift icon).
  3. Scroll down to the Codes section.
  4. Type in your code and hit Redeem.

What is Roblox Rivals?

Roblox Rivals is a fast-paced first-person shooter where players compete in various game modes, from Team Deathmatch to Capture the Flag. The game features a unique duel system where you can challenge other players to 1v1 battles.

item.title: All active Fisch codes in December 2025 and how to redeem them
item.description:
Fisch codes are the best way to get ahead in this relaxing Roblox fishing simulator. Whether you’re looking for extra cash to upgrade your rod or some bait to lure in the rarest catches, these codes have you covered.

Here are all the currently active Fisch codes for December 2025, along with instructions on how to redeem them.

Active Fisch Codes (December 2025)

  • Fischmas2025: Redeem for 500 Coins (New!)
  • BigCatch: Redeem for 10 Common Bait
  • GoldenRod: Redeem for a temporary luck boost
  • OceanBlue: Redeem for 200 Coins
  • GoneFishing: Redeem for 5 Rare Bait

Note: Codes often expire quickly, so be sure to redeem them as soon as possible!

item.title: About PC Gamer
item.description:
About PC Gamer

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and we continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show.

Our Mission

To bring you the most interesting, entertaining, and informative PC gaming coverage on the planet.

item.title: Affiliate Policy
item.description:
Affiliate Policy

PC Gamer is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission.

How it works

We pick products based on what we think is best for you. If you buy something through our links, we get a small cut of the sale. This helps fund our journalism and keeps our reviews independent.

Our Promise

We will never recommend a product just because it has an affiliate link. We only recommend products we truly believe in.

item.title: Community Guidelines
item.description:
Community Guidelines

We want PC Gamer to be a place where everyone can enjoy discussing PC games. To that end, we have a few simple rules:

  1. Be respectful. Treat others as you would like to be treated.
  2. No hate speech. Racism, sexism, homophobia, and other forms of hate speech will not be tolerated.
  3. No spam. Do not post the same message repeatedly or post links to unrelated sites.
  4. Stay on topic. Keep comments relevant to the article or discussion at hand.

Violating these guidelines may result in a ban.

item.title: Newsletter
item.description:
PC Gamer Newsletter

Sign up for the PC Gamer newsletter to get the best of PC Gamer delivered to your inbox every day.

  • Daily Digest: The biggest stories of the day.
  • Weekly Top 10: The best features and reviews of the week.
  • Hardware: The latest news and reviews from the world of PC hardware.

Sign Up Here
